p: Finally, we stress that our experimental results are very sound and reproducible, as testified from the fact that (i) five different TSL NWs with very similar structural characteristics show very similar Raman spectra (see Supporting Information 7); (ii) measurements performed in the same scattering geometry but with different excitation wavelengths on different NWs exhibit consistent spectral features (see Supporting Information 8); (iii) data acquired at 5.5 K on the same NWs measured at room temperature in the same configuration show consistent results (see Supporting Information 9).
